channel.title: CVE Feed for wpmudev -- Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpmudev -- Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2021-4417|2024-10-22T19:26:14.690Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.13.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the listen_for_saving_export_schedule() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export form submissions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-7389|2024-08-19T07:52:55.076Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.29.1 via class-forminator-addon-hubspot-wp-api.php. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract the HubSpot integration developer API key and make unauthorized changes to the plugin's HubSpot integration or expose personally identifiable information from plugin users using the HubSpot integration.

item.title: CVE-2024-7389|2024-08-02T14:00:25.375Z -- wpmudev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: The Forminator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.29.1 via class-forminator-addon-hubspot-wp-api.php. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract the HubSpot integration developer API key and make unauthorized changes to the plugin's HubSpot integration or expose personally identifiable information from plugin users using the HubSpot integration.
